name: Never Alone
summary: Never Alone, also known as Kisima Inŋitchuŋa, is a puzzle video game by Upper One Games. Swapping between an Iñupiaq girl named Nuna and her arctic fox companion, the player completes puzzles in a story based on Alaskan indigenous stories told in eight chapters. The game was released on November 18, 2014 on Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One.
